description: Resource Type definition for a Bot Alias, which enables you to change the version of a bot without updating applications that use the bot

S3BucketLogDestination.description: Specifies an Amazon S3 bucket for logging audio conversations

S3BucketArn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of an Amazon S3 bucket where audio log files are stored.
S3BucketArn.markdownDescription:
The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of an Amazon S3 bucket where audio log files are stored.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 2048  
Pattern: ^arn:[\w\-]+:s3:::[a-z0-9][\.\-a-z0-9]{1,61}[a-z0-9]$  
Update requires: No interruption

LogPrefix.description: The Amazon S3 key of the deployment package.
LogPrefix.markdownDescription:
The Amazon S3 key of the deployment package.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 1024  
Update requires: No interruption

KmsKeyArn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of an AWS Key Management Service (KMS) key for encrypting audio log files stored in an S3 bucket.
KmsKeyArn.markdownDescription:
The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of an AWS Key Management Service (KMS) key for encrypting audio log files stored in an S3 bucket.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 20  
Maximum Length: 2048  
Pattern: ^arn:[\w\-]+:kms:[\w\-]+:[\d]{12}:(?:key\/[\w\-]+|alias\/[a-zA-Z0-9:\/_\-]{1,256})$  
Update requires: No interruption

S3BucketLogDestination.markdownDescription:
Specifies an Amazon S3 bucket for logging audio conversations
